item.title: Zakir Hussain hospitalised in the US due to ‚Äòserious ailments‚Äô, family seeks prayers for recovery - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Zakir Hussain Hospitalised in the US, Family Requests Prayers for Recovery

Published on: Dec 15, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Tabla maestro Zakir Hussain has been hospitalised in San Francisco after experiencing heart-related health problems. His family seeks prayers for his speedy recovery.

  • Zakir Hussain was admitted to the ICU with serious health ailments.
  • He has been suffering from blood pressure issues leading to his hospitalization.
  • The family is asking for blessings and prayers for his recovery.
  • Zakir, at 73, is a renowned tabla player with multiple accolades.
‚ÄúHe is unwell and admitted in the ICU right now. We all are worried about the situation.‚Äù - Rakesh Chaurasia

The situation remains concerning for his family and fans as they await more updates on his health.

item.title: Boy injured at Allu Arjun's Pushpa 2 stampede on ventilator, Rashmika Mandanna on Vijay Deverakonda's voi - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Injured Boy on Ventilator After Allu Arjun's Pushpa 2 Premiere Stampede: Top Entertainment Updates

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

An unfortunate incident occurred during the premiere of Pushpa 2 when a stampede led to the injury of a boy, who is currently on a ventilator. The entertainment world is also abuzz with other updates regarding celebrity projects and personal news.

  • A stampede broke out during the premiere at Sandhya Theatre, leading to the injury of a boy and the death of a woman.
  • Rashmika Mandanna's upcoming film 'The Girlfriend' features Vijay Deverakonda's voiceover.
  • Allu Arjun was arrested following the stampede but was later released on bail.
  • Taapsee Pannu revealed she married Mathias Boe in December 2023, dispelling rumors of a 2024 wedding.
  • Varun Dhawan shared insights on fatherhood while promoting his film 'Baby John'.
"This is an unfortunate reality of an actor‚Äôs life," said Sonu Sood regarding Allu Arjun's situation.

The incident highlights the unexpected dangers that can arise during large gatherings, reminding fans and celebrities alike of the importance of safety in public events.

item.title: Pics: Keerthy Suresh-Antony kiss and dance at their white wedding in Goa - India Today
item.description:
Keerthy Suresh's Dreamy White Wedding with Antony in Goa

Publication Date: December 12, 2023 | Source: Instagram

Actor Keerthy Suresh married her longtime boyfriend Antony Thattil on December 12 in a picturesque ceremony on the beaches of Goa. She shared enchanting pictures from her wedding, showcasing the fairytale moment.

  • Keerthy Suresh and Antony Thattil tied the knot on December 12, 2023.
  • The wedding took place in Goa, featuring beautiful beach scenery.
  • Photos shared by Keerthy include moments of joy and love between the couple.
  • The couple used the hashtag "ForTheLoveOfNyke" in their wedding posts.
  • Highlights included Keerthy walking down the aisle with her father and a romantic kiss to seal their vows.
‚ÄúJust a fun groom having a blast at his wedding in Goa!‚Äù

This wedding beautifully captures the essence of love and celebration, marking the beginning of a new journey for Keerthy and Antony.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection day 11 early report: Allu Arjun film nears Rs 900 crore mark in India, eyes Baahubali 2‚Äôs record - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 box office collection day 11 early report: Allu Arjun film nears Rs 900 crore mark in India, eyes Baahubali 2‚Äôs record

Publication Date: December 2024
Source: Indian Express

Pushpa 2, featuring Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna, continues to break box office records as it approaches the Rs 900 crore milestone in India, with significant earnings expected over the weekend.

  • The film experienced a 73% surge in collections on Saturday.
  • By Sunday evening, it had already collected Rs 57.22 crore for that day alone.
  • The Hindi version is projected to earn Rs 60-65 crore on Sunday.
  • Pushpa 2 has surpassed the domestic lifetime collection of RRR with Rs 866.5 crore domestically and Rs 1,196 crore worldwide.
  • The film aims to break Baahubali 2's domestic record of Rs 1,030.42 crore.
‚ÄúDespite the controversy, the actor has received overwhelming support from his colleagues in the film industry.‚Äù

The film's success is being tempered by recent controversies involving Allu Arjun, yet public support remains strong.

item.title: Weekly Horoscope: December 16th to 22nd, 2024 - The Times of India
item.description:
Weekly Horoscope: December 16th to 22nd, 2024

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: Delhi Times

Welcome to this week's horoscope, where the celestial alignments offer insight into the lives of the zodiac signs. From career and love to finances and health, these forecasts provide a glimpse into what the week holds for you.

  • Aries: Embrace your energy, expect challenging situations at work but seize new opportunities.
  • Taurus: Focus on stability and patience; relationships will deepen.
  • Gemini: Engage your curiosity and creativity; prioritize your tasks to avoid overwhelm.
  • Cancer: Emotional growth is key‚Äîtrust your intuition and nurture relationships.
  • Leo: Balance ambition with relationships; face work challenges with calm communication.
  • Virgo: Be practical yet compassionate; celebrate small wins amidst challenges.
  • Libra: Seek balance; good communication will clear recent misunderstandings.
  • Scorpio: Blend caution with boldness; talk through worries with friends.
  • Sagittarius: Focus on self-discipline while pursuing creative opportunities.
  • Capricorn: Maintain productivity without overburdening yourself; self-care is crucial.
  • Aquarius: Nurture relationships while sharing innovative ideas at work.
  • Pisces: Embrace your emotions; seek a balance between helping others and self-care.
‚ÄúTrust your instincts when making decisions, as they will guide you toward the best outcomes.‚Äù

Overall, this week the horoscopes emphasize a mix of personal growth, relationship dynamics, and the importance of self-care amidst challenges. Keep an open mind and embrace the insights offered by the stars.

item.title: Lavanya Tripathi‚Äôs new film takes Kamal Haasan‚Äôs old movie title - 123telugu
item.description:
Lavanya Tripathi‚Äôs new film takes Kamal Haasan‚Äôs old movie title

Published on Dec 15, 2024 1:40 pm IST

Actress Lavanya Tripathi announces her new film titled 'Sathi Leelavathi', directed by Tatineni Satya, on her birthday. The title pays homage to the 1995 Kamal Haasan film.

  • The film is produced by Nagamohan Babu and Rajesh T under Durga Devi Pictures and Trio Studios.
  • Mickey J Meyer is set to score the music for the film.
  • Cinematography will be handled by Binendra Menon.
  • Lavanya expressed her excitement on social media, highlighting her eagerness to begin filming.
‚ÄúExtremely excited to be a part of this project! The story caught my attention with its amazing write-up and the solid team behind it. I‚Äôm thrilled to begin this next year. What a fantastic way to kick off the year!‚Äù

This film marks a significant milestone for Lavanya following her marriage to Varun Tej.

item.title: Saif Ali Khan on his recent meeting with PM Narendra Modi: ‚ÄòHe thought we would bring Taimur and Jehangir to meet him‚Äô - The Indian Express
item.description:
Saif Ali Khan on his recent meeting with PM Narendra Modi: ‚ÄòHe thought we would bring Taimur and Jehangir to meet him‚Äô

Date: December 2024

Source: The Indian Express

Earlier this week, Saif Ali Khan and others met Prime Minister Narendra Modi to invite him for Raj Kapoor‚Äôs 100th birth anniversary celebration.

  • The meeting included actors from the Kapoor family and was held to invite PM Modi to the Raj Kapoor Film Festival.
  • Saif described PM Modi as warm and charming despite a long day in Parliament.
  • During the meeting, Modi inquired about Saif‚Äôs children and signed a paper for them.
  • The film festival will feature ten films of Raj Kapoor across 40 cities in India from December 13-15.
‚ÄúHe asked about my parents individually and said he thought we would bring Taimur and Jeh to meet him.‚Äù - Saif Ali Khan

This meeting highlights the connection between Bollywood and politics, showing the importance of Raj Kapoor's legacy.

item.title: Anurag Kashyap on daughter Aaliyah Kashyap‚Äôs wedding: ‚ÄòYe bhi gayi‚Äô - The Indian Express
item.description:

Source: The Indian Express

Filmmaker Anurag Kashyap‚Äôs daughter Aaliyah Kashyap tied the knot with Shane Gregoire on December 11. Kashyap shared his thoughts about the wedding on Instagram.

  • Aaliyah married her long-time beau Shane Gregoire.
  • Anurag shared emotions through his Instagram post, thanking everyone involved in the wedding.
  • In his post, he referenced his daughter with a playful remark, indicating his emotions as a parent.
  • Aaliyah shared a series of photos capturing the wedding events, including haldi and cocktail parties.
Anurag Kashyap: ‚ÄúYe bhi gayi ... @shanegregoire my Silly take care of her. And I will get back to my stubborn self.‚Äù

The wedding festivities were widely shared on social media, showcasing significant family moments.

item.title: Anushka Shetty‚Äôs Ghaati locks its release date | Latest Telugu cinema news | Movie reviews | OTT Updates, OTT - 123telugu
item.description:
Anushka Shetty‚Äôs Ghaati locks its release date

Published on Dec 15, 2024

Ghaati is set to be the next big release for ‚ÄòThe Queen‚Äô Anushka Shetty. The recently unveiled glimpse features her in a completely new, massy avatar, showcasing a fresh side of her acting. Directed by Krish Jagarlamudi, this pan-Indian film is already generating buzz.

  • The film will be released on April 18, 2025, in Telugu, Tamil, Hindi, Kannada, and Malayalam.
  • Anushka Shetty plays a compelling role as a former victim turned criminal.
  • It focuses on a gripping tale of revenge, redemption, and retribution.
  • Screenplay by Krish, Sai Madhav Burra, and Chintakindi Srinivasa Rao.
  • Produced by UV Creations and First Frame Entertainments.

item.title: From Pavitra Punia - Eijaz Khan to Digvijay - Unnati; 2024's shocking splits - The Times of India
item.description:
From Pavitra Punia - Eijaz Khan to Digvijay - Unnati; 2024's shocking splits

Publication Date: Unknown Source: Unknown

In 2024, several notable television actors faced high-profile breakups, capturing the attention of fans and media alike. These separations highlight the challenges of maintaining relationships in the spotlight, where personal struggles often become public narratives.

  • Dalljiet Kaur and Nikhil Patel ended their marriage in March 2023, marking a surprising split.
  • Pavitra Punia and Eijaz Khan faced public scrutiny that contributed to their breakup.
  • Jashwant and Akriti's separation added to the narrative of celebrity relationship struggles.
  • Akshay Kharodia and Divya experienced challenges that led to their breakup in 2024.
  • Digvijay and Unnati's split attracted attention due to their popularity in the television scene.
‚ÄúLove can be complicated, even for celebrities.‚Äù

These high-profile breakups illustrate the complexities of love and relationships, especially under the constant glare of public attention.

item.title: Mohan Babu Says Anticipatory Bail NOT Rejected In Journalist Assault Case: 'False Propaganda' - News18
item.description:
Mohan Babu Addresses Anticipatory Bail Status in Journalist Assault Case

Date: December 14, 2024 Source: News18

Veteran actor Mohan Babu has clarified that his anticipatory bail petition has not been rejected, countering reports circulating in the media. He addressed the situation via social media to combat what he termed as 'false propaganda.'

  • Mohan Babu confirms his anticipatory bail has not been rejected.
  • He is currently receiving medical care at home.
  • The actor issued an apology to the journalist involved in the assault case.
  • He describes the incident as unfortunate and expresses regret.
‚ÄúFalse propaganda is being circulated! Anticipatory bail has NOT been rejected and currently, I am under medical care in my home.‚Äù - Mohan Babu

The actor's statement comes after reports claimed the Telangana High Court had rejected his bail plea amidst ongoing legal troubles involving an alleged attack on a journalist. His clarification aims to set the record straight regarding his legal status.

item.title: Samanta Calls Naga Chaitanya, Sobhita Dhulipala ‚ÄòMost Dignified Couple‚Äô; Drops UNSEEN Pics From Their Weddi - News18
item.description:
Samanta Calls Naga Chaitanya, Sobhita Dhulipala ‚ÄòMost Dignified Couple‚Äô; Drops UNSEEN Pics From Their Wedding

Date: December 14, 2024
Source: News18

Sobhita Dhulipala and Naga Chaitanya got married on December 4, at Annapurna Studios in Hyderabad. Fans are eager for more glimpses of their wedding day, and Samanta Dhulipala has shared unseen photos, expressing her heartfelt emotions about the event.

  • The wedding was a traditional Telugu ceremony.
  • Samanta described the moment as emotional, highlighting the love between her and Sobhita.
  • She referred to Naga Chaitanya and Sobhita as the most dignified couple she knows.
  • Pictures shared include Sobhita in her bridal attire and moments shared with family and friends during the ceremony.
‚ÄúThis was such an emotional moment for me.. love you so much Akka Only I know how you love and how much you do for the people in your life. To the most dignified couple I know Akka and Chay,‚Äù wrote Samanta.

The shared wedding moments have resonated with fans, and the couple's recent public appearances continue to attract media attention.
